Text.val: 01.02.2011 GB SCR16182 Extended list of parameters in the call BAD013
BAD306A - Check if client is daily, weekly or monthly
BAD306C - Initiate the printing CMP report
Finally update all selected INVOICE_UPFRONT rows of this client to allow restart
BAD306A - Check if client is daily, weekly or monthly

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/INUP where INUP_COMMMATDATE_AMOUNT <> 0 and INUP_COMMMATDATE_ADMNO = :2 and INUP_COMMMATDATE_CLNTNO = :3 and INUP_JOURNALNO_CMC = 0
